scripts.down: sed -i '1s|# /*   /maintenance.html   200|/*   /maintenance.html   200|' public/_redirects && git add public/_redirects && git commit -m "chore: site down for maintenance" && git push origin main
scripts.up: sed -i '1s|/*   /maintenance.html   200|# /*   /maintenance.html   200|' public/_redirects && git add public/_redirects && git commit -m "chore: site live again" && git push origin main
scripts.status: curl -sL https://patientguide.io | grep -qi '<title>Maintenance Mode' && echo 'MAINTENANCE' || echo 'LIVE'
scripts.down:purge: npm run down && npm run purge
scripts.up:purge: npm run up && npm run purge
